About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Jaehong Lee (Jay)

I am a second year Simon Fraser University student studying in Engineering Science.
I have serious passion in web development and have been constantly studying front-end engineering outside of school to become a better Developer.

UI/UX

I create funny websites for my friends and family to share laughter and joy.

Photo/Video Editing

As a visual person, I enjoy editing photos & videos to create fun projects.

Sports

I enjoy playing competitive basketball, baseball, and soccer with my friends during my spare time.
